subject: Shipment
description_text:
Hello, it has been 6 days since i have ordered my pedals, but you have yet
to ship them. Should I be expecting a delay? My order is  #SSN3668

conversations.body_text: Hi Domas Zilinskas,  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused by the logistics delay. Our German warehouse is currently out of stock, with restocking expected to be completed by the 28th. At that time, we will ship your order via DHL and refund the additional shipping fees.
